help_text: Select the type that best describes what you are developing. This affects the development process template used.

options.label: Complete System
options.description: A full system with multiple subsystems (e.g., flight management system, vehicle platform)

options.label: Subsystem
options.description: A major component within a larger system (e.g., navigation subsystem, brake control unit)

options.label: Software Application
options.description: Standalone software or embedded software component
